attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in this website
attributes.background: 115,000 people signed a petition for a vote of no confidence in Jeremy Hunt and you did jack all about it so I propose another vote of no confidence in this website and the weak-willed, grey-suited end of bells that run it.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament.
